== Introduction ==

An Adblock Plus filters list which is supplemental to EasyList? to help block advertisements on websites from Vietnam. Use the link "AdBlock? Plus - Bộ lọc Việt Nam" on the right to subscribe to this list.


== Quick Guide ==
*Method 1*: Go to Adblock Plus Options > Filters > Add filter subscription... > Add a different subscription.  Then paste the url of "Adblock Plus - Bộ lọc Việt Nam" into the address box. OK.

*Method 2*: Just copy this code and paste it into your browser. Then click OK.

`abp://subscribe/?location=http://adblockplus-vietnam.googlecode.com/files/abpvn.txt&title=AdBlock%20Plus%20%2D%20Bộ%20lọc%20Việt%20Nam`

CONGRATULATIONS! No more annoying advertisements!

.

*NOTE: This is just a supplemental list to EasyList, you should use it with EasyList to achieve best results.*
